issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

ubo latest

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

Mobile

https://www.tumblr.com/smallmariofindings

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. App banner on the top of the screen.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![Screenshot_20240418-022140_Trebuchet](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9675966/7186f5a7-e80d-4100-b888-c7bef36738f7)

</details>

### Privacy

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [X] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177580

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->
Hides ad leftovers.


2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/70459964/21d3238d-8057-437f-92ec-c0f7e9a2e831)

</details>




### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: AdGuard removes regular content, not ads
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.46

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://winaero.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Hello. I am Sergey Tkachenko, the owner of the winaero.com website. Some time ago a reader reported me an issue that with AdGuard, they have an empty sidebar on the website. The issue has been resolved by a filter update, but now this happens again. The most recent filter update removes almost everything from the sidebar, including the "Connect with us" section with static links to the social media my website is represented on, e-mail subscription, and RSS. I am sure that this block wasn't supposed to be removed, and wasn't removed by bad faith. There must be some unintentional bug in the filter. Could you please correct the filter and restore the block? It didn't annoy anyone a once.

3. Screenshots


<details><summary>With AdGuard</summary>

![ksnip_20240419-220131](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1557252/c78e9eac-85bf-4f73-9e51-f6cebb0cd737)

</details>

<details><summary>Without AdGuard</summary>

![ksnip_20240419-220506](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1557252/d0f52a5b-3194-4624-a25e-79da701c67ce)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Возможно, доломали сайт собственным правилом. Попробуйте удалить из пользовательского фильтра правила для этого сайта, или которое недавно добавили: Настройки => Защита => Блокировка рекламы => Пользовательские правила.

Чтобы пропало уведомление о блокировщике, включите `Фильтр всплывающих окон`

issue.title: AdGuard removes regular content, not ads

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.46

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://winaero.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Hello. I am Sergey Tkachenko, the owner of the winaero.com website. Some time ago a reader reported me an issue that with AdGuard, they have an empty sidebar on the website. The issue has been resolved by a filter update, but now this happens again. The most recent filter update removes almost everything from the sidebar, including the "Connect with us" section with static links to the social media my website is represented on, e-mail subscription, and RSS. I am sure that this block wasn't supposed to be removed, and wasn't removed by bad faith. There must be some unintentional bug in the filter. Could you please correct the filter and restore the block? It didn't annoy anyone a once.

3. Screenshots


<details><summary>With AdGuard</summary>

![ksnip_20240419-220131](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1557252/c78e9eac-85bf-4f73-9e51-f6cebb0cd737)

</details>

<details><summary>Without AdGuard</summary>

![ksnip_20240419-220506](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1557252/d0f52a5b-3194-4624-a25e-79da701c67ce)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Hi there, this block hides a rule from `EasyList`:
```
4sysops.com,9to5linux.com,backthetruckup.com,catcountry941.com,cnx-software.com,corrosionhour.com,corvetteblogger.com,dailyveracity.com,dcrainmaker.com,fastestvpns.com,gamingonphone.com,gizmochina.com,guides.wp-bullet.com,iwatchsouthparks.com,macsources.com,metalsucks.net,mmoculture.com,nasaspaceflight.com,openloading.com,planetofreviews.com,prepperwebsite.com,sashares.co.za,scienceabc.com,scienceandliteracy.org,survivopedia.com,techdows.com,techiecorner.com,techjuice.pk,theblueoceansgroup.com,thecinemaholic.com,tooxclusive.com,torrentfreak.com,trackalerts.com,trendingpoliticsnews.com,winaero.com##.widget_custom_html
```
`EasyList` is part of the `AdGuard Base filter`. Obviously, we shouldn't hide this element that specifies your social media links. I'd suggest excluding your website domain from that rule. @piquark6046, could you please make a change in `EasyList`?

issue.title: AdGuard removes regular content, not ads

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.46

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://winaero.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Hello. I am Sergey Tkachenko, the owner of the winaero.com website. Some time ago a reader reported me an issue that with AdGuard, they have an empty sidebar on the website. The issue has been resolved by a filter update, but now this happens again. The most recent filter update removes almost everything from the sidebar, including the "Connect with us" section with static links to the social media my website is represented on, e-mail subscription, and RSS. I am sure that this block wasn't supposed to be removed, and wasn't removed by bad faith. There must be some unintentional bug in the filter. Could you please correct the filter and restore the block? It didn't annoy anyone a once.

3. Screenshots


<details><summary>With AdGuard</summary>

![ksnip_20240419-220131](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1557252/c78e9eac-85bf-4f73-9e51-f6cebb0cd737)

</details>

<details><summary>Without AdGuard</summary>

![ksnip_20240419-220506](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1557252/d0f52a5b-3194-4624-a25e-79da701c67ce)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@piquark6046 Thank you!

For the user: Fixed. Filter update will be available within about 1–2 hours.
